newsitem.title: HONG KONG: HKSE says welcomes China's new rule on listings.
newsitem.headline: HKSE says welcomes China's new rule on listings.

text.p: The Hong Kong Stock Exchange said on Monday it welcomed the announcement by China's State Council on the listings by mainland enterprises in overseas markets.
The stock exchange said in a statement it believed the move would further clarify matters relating to the regulation of the share issues and listings by Chinese firms.
It said the stock exchange and the Securities and Future Commission had been participating in discussions with Chinese regulators, the China Securities Regulatory Commission, on the matters.
On Friday, China had issued to provincial and municipal governments a further notice on strengthening the regulation of share issues and listings in overseas markets.
